description.value:
Frequency once per hour

Effect A palpable weight extends from your familiar in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15]. Enemies who enter or start their turn within the aura must succeed at a Will save against your spell DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} as long as they remain within the aura, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 3} on a critical failure. The aura lasts until the end of your next turn, but the familiar can Sustain it up to 1 minute.
